RelatedSentence: Reflecting on the Congress debacle in the Lok Sabha elections , All India Congress Committee ( AICC ) president Sonia Gandhi on Monday wondered whether the party was in tune with the aspirations of the people , particularly the youth .
Addressing the first meeting of the Congress Working Committee ( CWC ) to take stock of the Lok Sabha defeat , Sonia asked party leaders to introspect on the results in all seriousness and in depth .
